um jogo com um conceito muito divertido e interessante, mas perde na hora de balancear os assassinos. muitos assassinos principalmente os de cash ( claro pay to win total) tem vantagens para não serem dectados, ou quantidades absurdas de armadilhas como a bruxa tem (10 ao mesmo tempo podem ser colocadas e ela pode se teletransportar pra elas quando são ativadas) combinações absurdas de vantagens que revelam a posição dos sobreviventes que chega a parecer que o assassino está usando algum hack pq eles te acham muito fácil. e os assassinos que alem de não fazerem barulho quando estão chegando perto,mas tbm ficam invisíveis? putz esses são os mais roubados, da nem graça um partida com eles.
Bon jeu, matchmaking un peu long mais ça va c'est jouable avec n'importe quel matériel
just a really fun game once you learn some on how to play

最棒的遊戲，雖然一開始覺得自己很差很爛，但整體遊戲性好玩到無話可說，現在幾乎是每天都必定會玩幾場的狀態了，不論當人或鬼都很有一番成就感，很棒的遊戲啦
Pomimo tego że community w tej grze jest mocno podzielone, to gra jest warta każdej spędzonej godziny i każdego wydanego grosza

im just playing for fun so its ok
快来一起玩最好玩的躲猫猫

整體來說算還不錯的遊戲

優點:1.遊戲氣氛營造得不錯，剛玩的人一定每秒都提心吊膽~
        2.需要一點遊戲技巧，新手跟老手也可以跟LOL一樣，差別很大 
        3.耐玩，價錢非常親民，原價只要500左右可以玩非常久的遊戲，而且常常特價

缺點:1.單排跟多排是二個世界，單排很辛苦，多排很輕鬆，強烈建議跟朋友一起玩
        2.很容易感受到路人的惡意，會影響遊戲體驗
        3.有時候..有些角度人類比鬼還醜，希望可以更符合大眾的審美觀

So much better than Friday the 13th! Devs are constantly updating and keeping game fresh with new maps, killers and survivors. Best horror survival game out there.

херня с багами. Я уверен создатели хотели добавить ещё больше багов, но директор  Метью Коут заявиль: "Я думаю мы проделали довольно хорошую работу". После этого игру не стлаи особо исправлять и баги остались. Спасибо Мэтью Коут - ну да, ну да, пошли мы нахер!

One of my favorite games. Has very interesting and unique characters and has plenty of licenses to make it very open to plenty of horror fans. Most of the chapters are always really exciting and add so much. The only issue with the game is how inconsistent it is with it's bugs and updates. The devs try their hardest all the time and you can see it, but almost every single patch has at least one bug that makes one aspect of the game broken. Above all that, the community is also really nice, but also can be very toxic. Overall, I would recommend this game to almost anyone that plays games and to give it a shot for a bit. It has a slow beginning, but becomes something really amazing and unique after you get a few several hours in.

El juego cada vez apoya mas a los asesinos que ya  tienen buenas ventajas , ahora combinan las habilidades mas op de todos los asesinos en uno . se vuelve imposile uno de ellos es la plaga. esta super op tiene de todo es rapida, largo alcanze , vulnerabilidad.  que los supervivientes contagiados contangian a los demas. pues que pedo el 80 % asesinos son ineptos que no puede ganar en otros juegos de competencia , se creen lo mejor aqui.
siguen los asesinos con muchas ventajas  . se les olvida que sin supervivientes no hay partidas.
